content.question: The figure shows a circuit with a resistor of resistance <math alttext="uppercase R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>R</mi></math> connected to a nonideal battery. The battery has an <math alttext="e m f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>emf</mi></math> <math alttext="script uppercase E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Ɛ</mi></math> and an internal resistance <math alttext="lowercase r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>r</mi></math>. What is the current generated by the battery?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction script uppercase E over lowercase r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>Ɛ</mi><mi>r</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="the fraction script uppercase E over uppercase R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>Ɛ</mi><mi>R</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator script uppercase E, and denominator lowercase r plus uppercase R, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>Ɛ</mi><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="script uppercase E times, open parenthesis, the fraction 1 over lowercase r, end fraction, plus the fraction 1 over uppercase R, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Ɛ</mi><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>R</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator script uppercase E, and denominator lowercase r plus uppercase R, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>Ɛ</mi><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>R</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
